Uses of Package

    Package Description
    gui  
    org.alicebot.ab  
  • Classes in org.alicebot.ab used by gui 
    Class and Description
    Bot
    This is the primary Bot class.

    Properties

  • Classes in org.alicebot.ab used by org.alicebot.ab 
    Class and Description
    AIMLMap
    implements AIML Map A map is a function from one string set to another.
    AIMLProcessorExtension
    The interface needed to implement AIML Extension A class implementing AIMLProcessorExtension should return a Set of tag names and provide a function to recursively evaluate the XML parse tree for each node associated with a new tag.
    AIMLSet
    implements AIML Sets AIML Sets are large lists of values with common typing.
    Bot
    This is the primary Bot class.
    Category
    Class to handle AIML Categories.
    Chat
    Primary class for creating a Chat interface between a Bot and a user.
    Contact
    This class is here to simulate a Contacts database for the purpose of testing contactaction.aiml
    Graphmaster
    The AIML Pattern matching algorithm and data structure.
    History
    History object to maintain history of input, that request and response
    Nodemapper
    Nodemapper data structure.
    ParseState
    ParseState is a helper class for AIMLProcessor
    Path
    Linked list representation of Pattern Path and Input Path
    Predicates
    Manage client predicates
    PreProcessor
    AIML Preprocessor and substitutions
    Properties
    Bot Properties
    StarBindings
    structure to hold binding of wildcards in input pattern, that pattern and topicpattern
    Stars
    Array of values matching wildcards
    Timer
    Specialized timer function for program instrumentation
